Who am I?

Đạt is an engineer; living —and working in Hồ Chí Minh City, Vietnam. I like spends my spare time for reading awesome books & sharing to people.

7 years in industry of Information Technology and Services in which responsibilities include software developer, project leader, solution architecture & pre-sales activities, proof-of-concept mentoring, technical support.
